00001 #include <TGraph.h>
00002 #include <TGraphErrors.h>
00003 #include "MakeGraph.hh"
00004 
00005 TGraph *makeGraph(const char *name, const std::vector<Double_t> &x_arr, const std::vector<unsigned int> &y_arr) {
00006   TGraph *a_gr=0;
00007   if (x_arr.size()>0 && x_arr.size()==y_arr.size()) {
00008     a_gr=new TGraph;
00009     if (a_gr) {
00010       a_gr->SetName(name);
00011       a_gr->SetTitle(name);
00012       a_gr->Set(x_arr.size());
00013       for (UInt_t gr_i=0; gr_i<x_arr.size(); gr_i++) {
00014         a_gr->SetPoint(gr_i,x_arr[gr_i],y_arr[gr_i]);
00015       } 
00016     }
00017   }
00018   return a_gr;
00019 }

00021 TGraph *makeGraph(const char *name, const std::vector<Double_t> &x_arr, const std::vector<int> &y_arr) {

00037 TGraph *makeGraph(const char *name, const std::vector<Double_t> &x_arr, const std::vector<Float_t> &y_arr) {
00038   TGraph *a_gr=0;
00039   if (x_arr.size()>0 && x_arr.size()==y_arr.size()) {
00040     a_gr=new TGraph;
00041     if (a_gr) {
00042       a_gr->SetName(name);

00053 TGraph *makeGraph(const char *name, const std::vector<Double_t> &x_arr, const std::vector<Double_t> &y_arr) {
00054   TGraph *a_gr=0;
00055   if (x_arr.size()>0 && x_arr.size()==y_arr.size()) {
00056     a_gr=new TGraph(x_arr.size(),&(x_arr[0]),&(y_arr[0]));
00057     if (a_gr) {
00058       a_gr->SetName(name);
00059       a_gr->SetTitle(name);
00060     }
00061   }
00062   return a_gr;
00063 }
00064 
00065 TGraph *makeGraph(const char *name, const std::vector<Double_t> &x_arr, const std::vector<Float_t> &y_arr, const std::vector<Float_t> &y_error_arr) {
00066   TGraphErrors *a_gr=0;
00067   if (x_arr.size()>0 && x_arr.size()==y_arr.size() && x_arr.size()==y_error_arr.size()) {
00068     a_gr=new TGraphErrors;
00069     if (a_gr) {
00070       a_gr->SetName(name);
00071       a_gr->SetTitle(name);
00072       a_gr->Set(x_arr.size());
00073       for (UInt_t gr_i=0; gr_i<x_arr.size(); gr_i++) {
00074         a_gr->SetPoint(gr_i,x_arr[gr_i],y_arr[gr_i]);
00075         a_gr->SetPointError(gr_i,0,y_error_arr[gr_i]);
00076       } 
00077     }
00078   }
00079   return a_gr;
00080 }
